name: Biffus
description:
Biffus is a 2D Jump'n'Run platformer. However, in contrast to the classical approach to the genre, you will find yourself unable to either run or jump at the start of each level. You have to lure enemies into traps in order to gain the ability the enemy had before.

Advance through eight levels, each one being more challenging then the one before.

Enjoy!

Controls

The game should be played on windows with keyboard or gamepad. Which one you want to use can be configured in the game's settings. There you find the controls itself, too.

FunctionKeyboardGamepad Move leftA / ←←Move rightD / →→Jump (if unlocked)SpaceSouth-ButtonRun (if unlocked)Left ShiftEast-ButtonFullscreen toggleAlt+Enter Dev's note

This game is Hannes Thalheim's and Marcel Winter's submission for Ludum Dare 45 - Theme: 'Start with nothing'.
